UI.rules: Booking conditions and rules of stay

Entertainment.note1: The recreation center “Grandpa's village” offers an atmosphere of tranquility where everyone can plunge into the silence of nature, recuperate and create new memories. Here you will find the simple but important joys of life: swimming in natural reservoirs, collecting memories, the joy of laughter and communication with loved ones.
Entertainment.note2: Our recreation center “Grandpa's village” is ideal for those who are looking for harmony with nature, comfort and unforgettable moments with family and friends.

Gallery.clickMode: {mode, select, desktop {Click} mobile {Press} other {Unknown}} on the photo to see more
Gallery.slogan: And then we will create new happy memories together.

Contacts.title: Contacts of the eco-estate “Grandpa's village”
Contacts.text1: Despite his venerable age, your Grandpa is very modern, so he has a **Telegram-bot**, I know how much you love useful and convenient services.
Contacts.text2: Use to book a house, or ask

Visit.title: Choose when you plan to visit the Estate
Visit.text: “Grandpa will quickly find the best accommodation options for these days”

BookingForm.note1: Children under 3 years old without extra bed are not charged.
BookingForm.note2: Children from 3 to 12 years old, with a separate bed, are charged at the children's rate - 150 UAH/day.

Rules.title: Your grandfather has some small whishes and rules that apply in the eco-estate
Rules.note2: Grandpa and the team of the Eco-estate “Grandpa's village” are your friends, always ready to help and make your vacation pleasant and unforgettable.
Rules.note3: Also remember that we cannot control the weather and other external circumstances, but we guarantee you a warm welcome and a comfortable stay.
Rules.note4: “Grandpa's village” guests get good, pleasant emotions and create unique, warm memories.

Houses.mainTitle: Eco complex of fabulous wooden houses
Houses.quote: “I have wooden houses and huts, you can choose any option to your liking. Scroll down - I'll show you everything”
Houses.title: Live here
Houses.note1: Welcome to the eco-complex “Grandpa's village”, located in a picturesque corner of Ukraine - in Chernihiv region near the Blue Lakes. We offer you a comfortable stay in cozy huts where you can feel harmony with nature. Our wooden houses are equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay.
Houses.note2: Discover a real outdoor recreation, enjoying clean air, walks in the woods and fabulous sunsets by the lake. The eco-complex “Grandpa's village” is an ideal place for family vacations, romantic weekends and recuperation.
